## `r users` Congress

### Rencontres R 2023 - Avignon

::: columns
::: {.column width="20%"}
![](images/Logo_Rencontres_R_fond_BlancFichier_2big_2.png){width="180"}
:::

::: {.column width="5%"}
:::

::: {.column width="75%"}
Rencontres R it's a great conference bringing together the R community, to share projects and discuss the latest news on the language. I presented survivalGPU in order to explain how to carry out survival analyzes with this package.  
[_Slides_](ressources/slides/RencontresR2023_survivalGPU_presentation.pdf)  
[_Github Repo_](https://github.com/Alexis-vs/RencontresR2023)
:::
:::

### EMOIS 2023 - Nancy

::: columns
::: {.column width="55%"}
EMOIS is a congress focused on epidemiological research. The objective of this presentation was to present for the first time our survivalGPU library, in particular the WCE model on signal detection, with a case study on pharmacovigilance. With the rise of large national medical databases, many researchers have been interested in using GPUs for their research. This presentation gave rise to a publication in the *Revue d'Épidémiologie et de Santé Publique* [@vanstraaten2023].  
[_Slides_](ressources/slides/EMOIS2023_survivalGPU.pdf)
:::
